exercise.title: PacMen Exercise
exercise.text: Generates PacMen that auto-move around the screen.

exercise.title: Eye Exercise
exercise.text: Like Xwindows Xeyes, but in the web browser

exercise.title: Real Time Bus Tracker Exercise
exercise.text: Watch where busses currently are driving in Boston/Massachusetts on an embedded Google Map.

exercise.title: Bad Bank Exercise
exercise.text: Using React components to build a website for an imaginary bank

foss.title: synadm
foss.text: The Admin CLI for Synapse (a communication server based on the Matrix specification)

foss.title: python3-discogs-client
foss.text: The Python library for accessing the Discogs API (the worlds [probably] largest free online database and marketplace of music releases

foss.title: beets
foss.text: A sophsticated media file tagger and music library manager written in Python

foss.title: DiscoDOS
foss.text: A CLI tool for DJ's and record collectors based on the discogs.com collection feature

foss.title: beets-xtractor
foss.text: A beets plugin based on the Essentia project of Barcelona's Universitat Pompeu Fabra

foss.title: beets-dirfields
foss.text: A beets plugin that remembers where files where originally stored on disk

tool.title: GIFace
tool.text: A face recognition and GIF slideshow tool. There was none out there that suited my needs, so I created one. Have fun!

tool.title: Jekyll Helpers
tool.text: Helpers to generate picture galleries for Jekyll based websites/blogs

tool.title: Transaction Cutter
tool.text: Cuts out the relevant pieces of transaction CSV files of a certain bank or PayPal - my first Python project ever :-O

tool.title: Audio Utils
tool.text: Shell scripts to mass-manipulate audio and video files

tool.title: Mailchimp Members
tool.text: Unpacks a mailchimp members list zip file, filters columns and writes new csv file

tool.title: GitHub Projects Util
tool.text: Uses PyGithub to retrieve "GitHub Project" (aka kanban) cards

tool.title: MPC 1000 Sequence Util
tool.text: CLI utility to manipulate sequence files of an AKAI MPC 1000 sampler device

tool.title: APC mini Controller Script
tool.text: Ableton Live 9.x controller script for the "Akai MPC mini"
